2011-05-28

BtVS: Faith, Hope & Trick - but mostly...

Ahh and BtVS just moves up a notch... Faith has arrived - the series that is about the "chosen one" gets its third... and coolest... slayer.

She rocks, and rolls, she does that dance with her hands above her head - and she's here to steal Buffy's chips!
